What should I expect from antivirus software when installing cryptocurrency mining software?

Avast and Kaspersky may flag this software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program). These warnings indicate that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC. You can review the resources provided to learn more about these false positives.

What should I do before running the new update if I have last launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this release?

If you have last launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this release, you should delete the following directories before running this new update:

* On Linux: `~/.komodo/vrsctest`
* On MacOS: `⁨Users⁩/⁨{YourUserName}/⁨Library⁩/⁨Application Support⁩/⁨Komodo/vrsctest`
* On Windows: `"%APPDATA%"\Komodo\VRSCTEST`
